title: Classify taxa — classify_taxa

title: Classify taxa — classify_taxa
code: classify_taxa(   data_source = NULL,   sel_con = NULL,   to = c("original", "species", "genus", "family") )

title: Classify taxa — classify_taxa
text: data_source SQL table contains taxon_id column. sel_con connection Vault database. character vector specifies classification level classify taxa. options original, species, genus, family.

title: Get abiotic data — get_abiotic_data
text: Get abiotic data Vault database. function filter gridpoints samples way, keep one gridpoint sample per non-gridpoint sample. First filter gridpoint samples keep samples within limit_by_distance_km limit_by_age_years non-gridpoint Next, add sample_id_link column non-gridpoint samples, closest gridpoint sample non-gridpoint sample. Finally, add abiotic data gridpoint samples, specified mode argument. mode = "nearest", add abiotic data closest gridpoint sample. mode = "mean" mode = "median", first calculate mean median abiotic data gridpoint sample. non-gridpoint samples samples associated

title: Get abiotic data — get_abiotic_data
code: get_abiotic_data(   con = NULL,   mode = c("nearest", "mean", "median"),   limit_by_distance_km = 50,   limit_by_age_years = 5000,   verbose = TRUE )

title: Get abiotic data — get_abiotic_data
text: con connection object created open_vault() mode character string specifying mode abiotic data aggregation. must one nearest, mean, median. limit_by_distance_km numeric value specifying maximum distance kilometers non-gridpoint gridpoint samples. limit_by_age_years numeric value specifying maximum age years non-gridpoint gridpoint samples. verbose logical value specifying whether print messages

title: Get abiotic data — get_abiotic_data
text: connection object abiotic data

title: Get references for selected data compilation — get_references
code: get_references(   data_source = NULL,   path = NULL,   type = c("Dataset", "DatasetSource", "DatasetSourceType", "SamplingMethod", "Sample",     "Taxon", "Trait", "AbioticVariable") )

title: Get references for selected data compilation — get_references
text: data_source tibble containing data compilation, obtained using extract_data() function. path character string specifying path VegVault file. type character vector specifying type references extracted. following types available: Dataset, DatasetSource, DatasetSourceType, SamplingMethod, Sample, Taxon, Trait, AbioticVariable.

title: Get references for selected data compilation — get_references

title: Get trait values for the data — get_traits

title: vaultkeepr 0.0.2
text: get_abiotic_data()- now link distance data (.e., needs “gridpoints” samples “non-gridpoints” samples present) removed select_abiotic_data_by_distance() built within get_abiotic_data() Dummy database - add AbioticDataReference data adjust creation “gridpoints” data several random points around “non-gridpoints” data. Test - remove hardcoded values replace evaluations based real size database
